availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born on August 21, 1817. In 1860, Price was a harness maker in Nelson County, Kentucky. Died on February 20, 1891.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson, District 1, p. 132; Find A Grave, "Thomas W. Price ( August 21, 1817 - February 20, 1891)," Memorial #99359729, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=PRI&GSpartial=1&GSbyrel=all&GSst=19&GScntry=4&GSsr=3121&GRid=99359729& (accessed June 22, 2017).
